colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024B (CES SNYIGS DUS KYI RGYAL BA GNYIS PA BU STON RIN CHEN GRUB KYIS MDZAD PA'I DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I SGO NAS BDE BAR GSHEGS @025A *, ,PA'I SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN RAB TU GNAS PA'I CHO GA BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR GYI 'DON BSGRIGS BKRA SHIS 'PHEL RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, THOS BSAM GLING GI KHAMS TSAN DAD BRTZON SNYING STOBS LDAN PA DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS TSE RING GIS LO RE BZHIN RAB GNAS BYAS SROL TSUGS PA'I 'DON CHAR DMIGS TE, KHU RAL CHEN MO DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI GRVA RIG PA CHOS RJE BLA ZUR SNGAGS RAM PA BLO BZANG CHOS 'DZIN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I BSHAD SGRUB DRI MA MED PA PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RIN DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ` 'DIS BSKRUN RNAM DKAR RLABS CHEN MTHU STOBS KYIS, ,RING MIN DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I LAM BZANG BRTEN, ,ZUNG 'JUG SKU BZHI'I GRONG DU PHYIN GYUR NAS, MTHA' YAS 'GRO BA DE LA 'GOD PAR SHOG ,DPAR 'DI NI BSKUL BA PO DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS TSE RING GIS RGYU YON SBYOR TE BZHENGS PA'O,, ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
